FinServ_FinancialAccountTransaction__c.name: FinServ_FinancialAccountTransaction__c
FinServ_FinancialAccountTransaction__c.description: Represents information about a single financial account transaction.

AllocatedEscrowPayment__c.description: The amount of the payment that's allocated towards escrow.

AllocatedFeeAmount__c.description: The amount of the payment that's allocated towards fees.

AllocatedInterestAmount__c.description: The amount of the payment that's allocated towards the interest.

AllocatedPrincipalAmount__c.description: The amount of the payment that's allocated towards the principal.

BillingStatement__c.description: Billing statement record associated with the account.

CardAccountID__c.description: Card number linked to the transaction.

Claim__c.description: The claim associated with the financial account transaction.

EscrowBalance__c.description: The balance on the escrow amount of the financial account.

FinancialAccount__c.description: Financial account to which the transaction pertains.

InsurancePolicy__c.description: The insurance policy associated with the financial account transaction.

PostDate__c.description: Date the transaction posted to the account.

PrincipalBalance__c.description: The balance on the principal amount of the financial account.

SourceSystemId__c.description: Record ID from an external data source.

SourceTransactionType__c.description: Source transaction type from an external data source.

TransactionId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the transaction in an external data source.

TransactionStatus__c.description: Status of the transaction. Pending Posted
